-- | Haskell bindings for the Microsoft Azure Service Management API
--   
--   At the moment, this module only provides minimal functionality, just
--   enough to support the <a>distributed-process-azure</a> package (Azure
--   backend for Cloud Haskell). However, the code is set up in such a way
--   that adding additional functionality should be relatively
--   straightforward; developers who wish to do will probably want to
--   consult the Windows Azure Service Management REST API Reference
--   (<a>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/ee460799.aspx</a>).
@package azure-service-api
@version 0.1.0.0

module Network.Azure.ServiceManagement

-- | A cloud service is a bunch of virtual machines that are part of the
--   same network (i.e., can talk to each other directly using standard TCP
--   connections).
data CloudService

-- | Name of the service.
cloudServiceName :: CloudService -> String

-- | Virtual machines that are part of this cloud service.
cloudServiceVMs :: CloudService -> [VirtualMachine]

-- | Virtual machine
data VirtualMachine

-- | Name of the virtual machine.
vmName :: VirtualMachine -> String

-- | The <i>internal</i> IP address of the virtual machine (that is, the IP
--   address on the Cloud Service). For the globally accessible IP address
--   see <a>vmInputEndpoints</a>.
vmIpAddress :: VirtualMachine -> String

-- | Globally accessible endpoints to the virtual machine
vmInputEndpoints :: VirtualMachine -> [Endpoint]

-- | Globally accessible endpoint for a virtual machine
data Endpoint

-- | Name of the endpoint (typical example: <tt>SSH</tt>)
endpointName :: Endpoint -> String

-- | Port number (typical examples are 22 or high numbered ports such as
--   53749)
endpointPort :: Endpoint -> String

-- | Virtual IP address (that is, globally accessible IP address).
--   
--   This corresponds to the IP address associated with the Cloud Service
--   (i.e., that would be returned by a DNS lookup for
--   <tt>name.cloudapp.net</tt>, where <tt>name</tt> is the name of the
--   Cloud Service).
endpointVip :: Endpoint -> String

-- | Find the endpoint with name <tt>SSH</tt>.
vmSshEndpoint :: VirtualMachine -> Maybe Endpoint

-- | Azure setup
--   
--   The documentation of <a>distributed-process-azure</a> explains in
--   detail how to obtain the SSL client certificate and the private key
--   for your Azure account.
--   
--   See also <a>azureSetup</a>.
data AzureSetup
AzureSetup :: String -> X509 -> PrivateKey -> String -> AzureSetup

-- | Azure subscription ID
subscriptionId :: AzureSetup -> String

-- | SSL client certificate
certificate :: AzureSetup -> X509

-- | RSA private key
privateKey :: AzureSetup -> PrivateKey

-- | Base URL (generally <a>https://management.core.windows.net</a>)
baseUrl :: AzureSetup -> String

-- | Initialize Azure
azureSetup :: String -> String -> String -> IO AzureSetup

-- | Find available cloud services
cloudServices :: AzureSetup -> IO [CloudService]
instance Binary AzureSetup
instance Show Endpoint
instance Show VirtualMachine
instance Show CloudService
instance Show HostedService
